name: Voice of the forest
description:
Description:

You play as mother tree use your mushroom friends to help you reconnect with other trees in the forest, plant, grow and thrive.


Goal:

Connect all the trees as quick as possible.

Controls:
  •  Left mouse button (LMB): Interact with objects.
  • Right mouse button (RMB): Drag to move camera
  • Mouse wheel:  Zoom
Credits:
